snippet: Air quality in India worse than China and Bangladesh, a Yale and Columbia study says.
abstract: Air quality in India worse than China and Bangladesh, a Yale and Columbia study says.

byline.original: By HEATHER TIMMONS and MALAVIKA VYAWAHARE

lead_paragraph: India has the worst air pollution in the entire world, beating China, Pakistan, Nepal and Bangladesh, according to a study released during this year's World Economic Forum in Davos.

headline.main: India's Air the World's Unhealthiest, Study Says
